    • getCarProperty

      public <T> T getCarProperty​(ScenarioLoader.CarProperty carProperty, T defaultValue)
      Looks up the sub node (specified in parameter name) of the given element node and writes the data to the global variable with the same name. If this was successful, the global variable "isSet_<name>" will be set to true.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of property to look up.
      Parameters:
      carProperty - Property to look up.
      defaultValue - Default value (will be returned if no valid property could be found).
      Returns:
      Value of the property.
